articles.author: Deeksha Sharma
articles.title: Janet Yellen's bow to Chinese official in Beijing fails to wow Americans back home - Republic World
articles.description: US Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen on Saturday, enthusiastically bowed thrice to China's Vice Premier He Lifeng during her visit to Beijing.
articles.content: US Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen opted for a traditional greeting as she met a top Chinese official during her visit to Beijing. On Saturday, the 76-year-old enthusiastically bowed thrice to China'… [+1900 chars]
